name: Hollow Hills - A Game I Made When I Was 10
name_original: Hollow Hills - A Game I Made When I Was 10
description:
When I was 10 years old I read a book and hated the main romance. I thought it'd be nice to have my own version where two other characters ended up together instead. When I was 12 I went back to it and edited the music, but that was all. 7 years after the original copy I've finally found it, and I'm sharing it with all of you.

Enjoy this cliché garbage full of horrible grammar and tonnes of misspellings; 10-year-old me spent a lot of time on this. There's even a little credits video at the end <3.
